name: Vegetarian Black Bean And Sweet Potato Tacos 🥗
description: Looking for a delicious and healthy vegetarian dinner option? Look no further! Filled with savory black beans, sweet potatoes, and fresh avocado, these tacos are sure to satisfy your cravings.
instructions: Toss the sweet potatoes with the olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium microwave-safe bowl, and microwave until tender, about 2 minutes.
Heat the tortillas in a dry skillet over low heat and fill with cooked sweet potatoes, black the beans, pico de gallo, and avocado. Garnish with cilantro.
